steps: step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Click on svg
step 3: Click on link ' Place an order'
step 4: Click button and proceed to checkout page
step 5: Click on input field 'delivery id'
step 6: Click on input field 'shipping address.first name'
step 7: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.first name'
step 8: Click on input field 'shipping address.last name'
step 9: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.last name'
step 10: Click on input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
step 11: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
step 12: Click on input field 'shipping address.zip'
step 13: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.zip'
step 14: Click on input field 'shipping address.city'
step 15: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.city'
step 16: Click on input field 'shipping address.state'
step 17: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.state'
step 18: Click on input field 'shipping address.phone'
step 19: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.phone'
step 20: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO PAYMENT' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
step 21: Click on input field 'payment method id'
step 22: Click on button 'COMPLETE ORDER' -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 23: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
